entry.title: Friday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
